name: MapDB
description: MapDB provides concurrent Maps, Sets and Queues backed by disk storage or off-heap-memory. It is a fast and easy to use embedded Java database engine.

name: PalDB
description: An embeddable write-once key-value store written in Java.

name: TiDB
description: TiDB is a distributed SQL database compatible with MySQL protocol.

name: SequoiaDB
description: SequoiaDB is a document-oriented NoSQL Database.

name: LevelDB
description: LevelDB is a fast key-value storage library written at Google that provides an ordered mapping from string keys to string values.

name: ledisdb
description: a high performance NoSQL powered by Go.

name: influxdb
description: Scalable datastore for metrics, events, and real-time analytics.

name: ArangoDB
description: ArangoDB is a native multi-model database with flexible data models for documents, graphs, and key-values. Build high performance applications using a convenient SQL-like query language or JavaScript extensions.

name: RethinkDB
description: The open-source database for the realtime web.
